annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137, in subsec. (a), substituted “a proceeding under this chapter” for “a proceeding”.

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Former § 46-303.14 has been recodified as § 46-303.15 by D.C. Law 16-137, § 2(c)(15).
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 314 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
